sleep_time.description: Time in milliseconds between ICMP requests

icmp_payload_size.description: Payload size per ICMP request in bytes. MUST match controller.py. Use 32 on Windows or 52 on Linux to blend in.

icmp_callback_server.description: IP address of the callback server that the controller listens on

pipename.description: Named pipe to connect your beacon to (must match TeamServer pipename)

payload_max_size.description: Maximum payload size for Cobalt Strike (512 KB)

buffer_max_size.description: Maximum buffer size (10 MB) for reading from the Named Pipe
